title: All the Backlist! July 22, 2022
description:
This week, Danika recommends two of the most mind-blowing books she’s ever read. They’re also both sapphic and both by Black authors!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
BOOKS MENTIONED:
Everfair by Nisi Shawl
The Salt Roads by Nalo Hopkinson
